snippet.title: RESISTOR | First Look Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
RESISTOR is a turbocharged narrative-driven adventure RPG featuring open-world exploration, stunt-infused racing, and explosive vehicular combat! Build up your team and unravel a twisting story as you compete to take down an oppressive mega-corporation and its enigmatic director.

Take a first look at how this ‘CARPG’ blends cinematic storytelling with arcade-style racing as rising star Aster comes face to face with a dangerous new adversary. Design your own racer, customise your ride, and reconfigure your plasma engine before hitting the track to dominate your rivals and master increasingly more hazardous environments! 

Coming soon to Steam, Epic Games, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S & Nintendo Switch, wishlist now! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2271050/RESISTOR/

Learn more: https://pqube.co.uk/games/resistor/

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
